about_the_game:
Get the ultimate cooking experience with the Expert’s Pack! The boosters in this pack will help you become a master chef in no time. The Pack contains:

1,200 Rubies and 16,000 coins, so you can buy all the cooking equipment you need for your restaurants;

8 hours of ongoing grocery delivery, so you can play as many levels as you like;

4 Nonstick Coating boosters, to stop your dishes burning or spoiling;

4 Instant Cooking boosters, so you can prepare all dishes instantly;

4 Double Profit boosters, to increase your earnings.

Become a cooking expert!
detailed_description:
Get the ultimate cooking experience with the Expert’s Pack! The boosters in this pack will help you become a master chef in no time. The Pack contains:

1,200 Rubies and 16,000 coins, so you can buy all the cooking equipment you need for your restaurants;

8 hours of ongoing grocery delivery, so you can play as many levels as you like;

4 Nonstick Coating boosters, to stop your dishes burning or spoiling;

4 Instant Cooking boosters, so you can prepare all dishes instantly;

4 Double Profit boosters, to increase your earnings.

Become a cooking expert!
name: Cooking Live - Expert’s Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Be a Cooking Expert with the Expert’s Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
